biotools.summary: We developed a method LBtope for predicting linear B-cell epitopes. We developed several models using various techniques (e.g., SVM, IBk)on a large dataset of B-cell epitopes and non-epitopes (12063 epitopes and 20589 non epitopes obtained from IEDB database).

bioschemas.name: lbtope
bioschemas.summary: We developed a method LBtope for predicting linear B-cell epitopes. We developed several models using various techniques (e.g., SVM, IBk)on a large dataset of B-cell epitopes and non-epitopes (12063 epitopes and 20589 non epitopes obtained from IEDB database).
